name: Spaced Out (Smithn10)
description:
Fast pace and entertaining shoot-em-up game! In Spaced Out you play as a ship who is protecting the galaxy from space invaders. Shoot your way through the galaxy to survive and finally defeat the boss of the space invaders, Octane.

This is a very small independent game with all assets, programming, and development done by myself. Enjoy everyone!

Controls:  Move right and left with arrow keys, and shoot with the spacebar.
